sentences.chinese: 作为一名化石搜寻者，舒宾的杰出成就是在2004年带领了一次北极探险。 在这次探险中，他们发现了一种半鳍半肢的动物——一条有腕的鱼化石。

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.

trans: v. 告密；长声尖叫 n. 尖叫声

sentences.chinese: 他们开车走了，轮胎发出吱的一声。

trans: vi. 眯眼看；斜视；窥视；偏移 vt. 使斜眼；眯眼看 n. 斜视；斜孔小窗；一瞥 adj. 斜视的；斜的

trans: v. 发出嘎吱声；压坏，压扁；挤进 n. 咯吱声

trans: n. 气泡，泡沫，泡状物；透明圆形罩，圆形顶 vi. 沸腾，冒泡；发出气泡声 vt. 使冒泡；滔滔不绝地说

sentences.chinese: 水烧开时，水面会冒泡泡。

sentences.english: soap bubbles

sentences.chinese: 她用吸管在牛奶里吹泡泡。

sentences.chinese: 我希望我的生活是丰富多彩的和有价值的。

sentences.chinese: 因为她的努力，她的花园是如此的丰富多彩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 富有色彩的； 有趣的

sentences.chinese: 警察让我把口袋里的东西都掏出来。

name: stick

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

trans: adj. 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

trans: 崩溃；土崩瓦解；破碎

name: lost

sentences.english: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

sentences.chinese: …一只宠物龟。

detailed_translations.english: a  reptile  that lives mainly in water and has a soft body covered by a hard shell

sentences.chinese: 浴室地面上都是水。

sentences.chinese: 大树环绕的房子

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

name: teacher

sentences.chinese: 小学教师

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to teach, especially in a school

name: city

detailed_translations.english: a large important town

sentences.chinese: 那只兔子消失在树丛中。

sentences.english: At this time, a robust rabbit said: "No, or eat me !
sentences.chinese: 这时，一只健壮的兔子又说：“不，还是先吃我吧！

sentences.english: Mother rabbit told him that he was old enough to eat other food, but not keep pestering her to suckle.
sentences.chinese: 兔妈妈让他不要老缠着妈妈吃奶，他已经能够自己去吃些别的东西啦。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with long ears and soft fur, that lives in a hole in the ground

name: dry
trans: adj. 干的；口渴的；枯燥无味的；禁酒的 vt. 把…弄干 vi. 变干 n. 干涸 n. (Dry)人名；(法)德里

sentences.english: I need to change into some dry clothes .
sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.english: Make sure that the surface is clean and dry before you start to paint.
sentences.chinese: 油漆之前一定先要确保表面清洁干燥。

sentences.english: You should store disks in a cool, dry place.
sentences.chinese: 你应该把磁盘存放在阴凉干燥的地方。

sentences.english: The path is dry as a bone (= very dry ) .
sentences.chinese: 这条小道很干燥。

detailed_translations.english: without water or liquid inside or on the surface

name: mix
trans: v. （使）混和；配制；参与；相容，平安相处；交往，交际；混合录音；混成；并置，使相结合；（非正式）打起来 n. 混合；良莠不齐；混合物；各色人混杂的一群；混乱；成分比例；配料；混录，混音；乐曲组合，连奏；叠化图像 n. (Mix) （美、俄、巴）米克斯（人名）

sentences.english: Oil and water don’t mix.
sentences.chinese: 油和水不相融。

detailed_translations.english: if you mix two or more substances or if they mix, they combine to become a single substance, and they cannot be easily separated

name: mud
trans: n. 泥；污蔑；（非正式）干杯 v. 弄脏，用泥涂

sentences.english: They daubed mud all over themselves.
sentences.chinese: 他们用泥涂满全身。

sentences.english: I dirty my trousers when I step on the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我一脚擩在烂泥里， 把裤子弄脏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

name: sand
trans: n. 沙；沙地；沙洲；沙滩；沙子 vt. 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子 vi. 被沙堵塞 n. (Sand)人名；(英、德、意、芬、罗、捷、挪)桑德；(瑞典)桑德；(法)桑

sentences.english: a mixture of sand and cement
sentences.chinese: 沙和水泥的混合物

sentences.english: I have sand in my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我的鞋里有沙子。

detailed_translations.english: a substance consisting of very small pieces of rocks and minerals, that forms beaches and deserts

detailed_translations.chinese: 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子
detailed_translations.english: to make a surface smooth by rubbing it with  sandpaper  or using a special piece of equipment

name: scoop
trans: n. 勺，铲子；一勺（的量）；独家新闻；最新消息；夸张的上滑音 v. 用勺舀；抱起；抢先报道；赢得；滑唱

sentences.english: ...the sound of a spoon scooping dog food out of a can.
sentences.chinese: …用勺子从罐子里舀狗粮的声音。

detailed_translations.english: If you scoop something from a container, you remove it with something such as a spoon
an important or exciting news story that is printed in one newspaper or shown on one television station before any of the others know about it

name: shape
trans: n. 形状；模型；身材；具体化 vt. 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合 vi. 形成；成形；成长 n. (Shape)人名；(瑞典)沙佩

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

name: act
trans: v. 行动；表现；起作用；扮演（角色）；担任；假装；代理 n. 行为；假装；某种行为（或常规等）；法令；判决书；会议记录；（戏剧等的）幕；表演；演出团体 abbr. 活跃的 (active)；演员 (actor)；实际的 (actual)

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

name: line
trans: n. 路线，航线；排；绳 vt. 排成一行；划线于；以线条标示；使…起皱纹 vi. 排队；站成一排 n. (Line)人名；(英)莱恩；(俄)利涅

sentences.english: Draw a straight line across the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 在这一页的上方画一条直线。

sentences.english: Sign your name on the dotted line (= line made up of a series of dots ).
sentences.chinese: 在虚线上签名。

sentences.english: The edges of the pitch are marked by white lines.
sentences.chinese: 球场的四边画着白线。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to stop the ball going over the line.
sentences.chinese: 守门员刚好把球截住，没有让它越过球门线。

sentences.english: He raced towards the finishing line.
sentences.chinese: 他朝终点线冲刺。

sentences.english: The four men were standing in a line on the other side of the table.
sentences.chinese: 那四个男人在桌子的另一边站成一排。

sentences.english: Light travels in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 光沿直线传播。

sentences.english: A boat came into my line of vision (= direction I was looking in ).
sentences.chinese: 一艘船进入了我的视线。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin mark on a piece of paper, the ground, or another surface

name: nervous
trans: adj. 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

name: prop
trans: n. 支柱，支撑物；支持者；道具；（橄榄球中的）支柱前锋；（语法）结构词；（马快跑时的）骤停；（戏剧、电影的）道具；（非正式）道具管理员；（非正式，飞机的）螺旋桨 v. 支撑；放置；用……撑住（某物）；（马等挺直前腿）骤停

sentences.english: Anna looks after costumes and props.
sentences.chinese: 安娜管理服装和道具。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支柱，支撑物；支持者；道具；（橄榄球中的）支柱前锋
detailed_translations.english: an object placed under or against something to hold it in a particular position

detailed_translations.chinese: 支撑，支持，维持；使倚靠在某物上
detailed_translations.english: to support something by leaning it against something, or by putting something else under, next to, or behind it

name: bakery
trans: n. 面包店

sentences.english: A smell of bread drifted from some distant bakery.
sentences.chinese: 一股面包的味道从远处的某个面包店飘来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where bread and cakes are baked, or a shop where they are sold

name: fire station
trans: 消防站

sentences.english: The bulb, which hangs idly about in a fire station in Livermore, California, holds the Guinness World Record.
sentences.chinese: 这只悠闲的挂在加州利物浦的一个消防站的灯泡，拥有了一项吉尼斯世界纪录。

sentences.english: This study correlates the amount of fire damage in major residential fires to their distance from the nearest fire station.
sentences.chinese: 这个研究将主要住宅区火灾损失的金额与它们到最近消防站的距离关联起来。

detailed_translations.english: a building where the equipment used to stop fires burning is kept, and where  firefighters  stay until they are needed

name: neighborhood
trans: n. 附近；街坊；接近；街区

sentences.english: Iterates may be categorized into stable and unstable sets depending on whether a neighborhood under iteration converges or diverges. Some move toward stability, others away.
sentences.chinese: 根据一个受迭代影响的社区是聚合还是发散，迭代可以被归类到稳定和不稳定集。有些转向稳定，有些转离。

name: street
trans: n. 街道 adj. 街道的 n. (Street)人名；(英、葡)斯特里特；(德)施特雷特

sentences.english: We moved to Center Street when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.english: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.chinese: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.english: I walked on further down the street .
sentences.chinese: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.english: Someone just moved in across the street .
sentences.chinese: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.english: a car parked on the other side of the street
sentences.chinese: 停在街对面的一辆车

detailed_translations.english: a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides

name: freeway
trans: n. 高速公路

sentences.english: the Central Freeway
sentences.chinese: 中央高速公路

detailed_translations.english: a very wide road in the US, built for fast travel

name: move
trans: v. 移动；改变；进展；采取行动；搬家；调动；离开；感动；激起；促使；提议；走棋；快点；出售；使（肠）排空 n. 行动，举措；移动；改变；迁居；步骤；走棋

sentences.english: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.chinese: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.english: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.chinese: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.english: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.chinese: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.english: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.english: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.english: His speech moved the audience to tears.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He made no move to come any nearer.
sentences.chinese: 他没有再靠近。

detailed_translations.english: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this
when someone moves for a short time in a particular direction

name: store
trans: n. 商店；储备，贮藏；仓库 vt. 贮藏，储存 n. (Store)人名；(德)施托雷

sentences.english: At Christmas the stores stay open late.
sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节期间，商店营业到很晚。

sentences.english: a store of wood
sentences.chinese: 木料储备

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.

name: learn
trans: vt. 学习；得知；认识到 vi. 学习；获悉

sentences.english: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.chinese: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.english: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.english: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.chinese: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to gain knowledge of a subject or skill, by experience, by studying it, or by being taught

name: preschool
trans: adj. 未满学龄的；就学前的，入学前的 n. 幼儿园，育幼院

sentences.english: preschool children
sentences.chinese: 学龄前儿童

detailed_translations.chinese: 未满学龄的；就学前的，入学前的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the time in a child’s life before they are old enough to go to school
a school for children between two and five years of age

name: bored
trans: adj. 无聊的；无趣的；烦人的 v. 使厌烦（bore的过去式）；烦扰

sentences.english: He was easily bored.
sentences.chinese: 他很容易感到厌烦。

sentences.english: After a while, I got bored and left.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

detailed_translations.english: tired and impatient because you do not think something is interesting, or because you have nothing to do

name: gray
trans: adj. 灰色的；苍白的；灰白头发的；阴郁的 n. 灰色；暗淡的光线 vi. 成为灰色或灰白 vt. 使成灰色或灰白 n. (Gray)人名；(意)格拉伊；(英、法、葡、瑞典)格雷

sentences.english: I like that little gray one. The kids like that one too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢那只灰色的小鸭子， 孩子们也喜欢那只。

sentences.english: Once again he found himself inside the apartment in the enormous gray house.
sentences.chinese: 他又一次发现自己在那所庞大的灰色的房子的房间里了。

sentences.english: If I live in the Pacific Ocean, I can be gray with black spots.
sentences.chinese: 如果我生活在太平洋，我的颜色很可能是带有黑点的灰色。

name: lizard
trans: n. 蜥蜴；类蜥蜴爬行动物 n. (Lizard)人名；(法)利扎尔

sentences.english: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.chinese: 无论是蜥蜴还是玻璃，都没有任何秘密。

sentences.english: A lizard will regenerate its tail if it's cut off.
sentences.chinese: 蜥蜴的尾巴如被切掉，它会重新生出一条尾巴。

sentences.english: Meetings are just one symptom of anorganization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.chinese: 会海只是这类靠蜥蜴脑运作的组织的一个症状。

detailed_translations.english: a type of reptile that has four legs and a long tail

name: play
trans: vt. 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛 vi. 演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛 n. 游戏；比赛；剧本 n. (Play)人名；(法、瑞典)普莱

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

name: broccoli
trans: n. 花椰菜；西兰花 n. (Broccoli)（意、美）布罗科利（人名）

sentences.english: If you want a vegetable, go eat broccoli.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要蔬菜，你可以去吃花椰菜。

sentences.english: For example, you can prepare an omelet using red/green pepper, mushrooms, red onion, tomatoes, and a little broccoli - garnish with low fat cheese, low fat sour cream, and salsa.
sentences.chinese: 例如，你可以利用红/绿辣椒、蘑菇、红葱头、西红柿和一个小花椰菜作为装饰，以及低脂奶酪、低脂酸奶油和沙司来制作煎蛋卷。

sentences.english: One oddity is that all produce is sold by the piece, with no scales in sight, making it difficult to compare loose items like broccoli or squash that are elsewhere priced by the pound.
sentences.chinese: 有一个怪事就是所有的农产品都是论个儿卖的，你也看不到磅秤，这样对于比较像花椰菜或者果汁汽水就困难了，其他地方都论磅卖。

detailed_translations.english: a green vegetable that has short branch-like stems

name: gorilla
trans: n. 大猩猩

sentences.english: Lose yourself in the play. Be a dinosaur, or a gorilla, or a villain.
sentences.chinese: 放下自己的架子，扮演一只恐龙，或者是大猩猩，甚至是一个坏蛋。

sentences.english: In fact, he found that there was scarcely any information on gorilla cognition at all.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他发现任何有关大猩猩认知的信息都非常稀少。

sentences.english: The most famous albino animal of all was Snowflake the gorilla, who lived at Barcelona Zoo from 1966 until his death from skin cancer in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的白化动物是大猩猩雪花。 自1966年以来，他一直生活在巴塞罗纳动物园，直到2003年死于皮肤癌。

detailed_translations.english: a very large African monkey that is the largest of the  apes

name: pirate
trans: n. 海盗，海上劫掠者；盗版者，侵犯专利权者；非法制作电视或广播节目的人（或组织）；道德败坏者，违法者 v. 盗印，窃用；劫掠（船只）；劫掠（船只） adj. 盗版的

sentences.english: Computer game pirates cost the industry twenty million pounds a year.
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏盗版者每年要给该行业带来两千万英镑的损失。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者
detailed_translations.english: someone who sails on the seas, attacking other boats and stealing things from them
to illegally copy and sell another person’s work such as a book, video, or computer program

name: vampire
trans: n. 吸血鬼；[脊椎] 吸血蝙蝠

name: bring
trans: vt. 拿来；带来；促使；引起；使某人处于某种情况或境地 n. (Bring)人名；(英、瑞典)布林

sentences.english: Did you bring an umbrella?
sentences.chinese: 你带伞了吗？

sentences.english: The senator’s speech brought an angry response from Civil Rights groups.
sentences.chinese: 那名参议员的话引起了一些民权组织的愤怒。

sentences.english: The discovery of gold brought thousands of people to the Transvaal.
sentences.chinese: 黄金的发现把成千上万的人引到了德兰士瓦。

detailed_translations.english: to take something or someone with you to the place where you are now, or to the place you are talking about

name: buddy
trans: n. 伙伴，好朋友；密友；小男孩 vi. 做好朋友，交朋友 n. (Buddy)人名；(英)巴迪

sentences.english: We’re good buddies.
sentences.chinese: 我们是好朋友。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伙伴，好朋友；密友；小男孩
detailed_translations.english: a friend

name: choose
trans: vt. 选择，决定 vi. 选择，挑选

sentences.english: It took us ages to choose a new carpet.
sentences.chinese: 我们挑选新地毯花了很长时间。

sentences.english: A panel of judges will choose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 会由一个评判小组选出冠军。

sentences.english: He chose his words carefully as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他说话时字斟句酌。

sentences.english: You can, if you choose, invest in the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意，可以投资股票市场。

detailed_translations.english: to decide which one of a number of things or people you want

name: climb
trans: v. 爬；攀登；上升；（植物沿墙或架子）攀缘生长；晋升；（道路）倾斜向上；爬升；费力爬进（或爬出） n. 爬；攀登；增值；（职位或社会地位的）提高；（名次的）攀升；（登山或攀缘运动中要爬的）山；山道；（飞机的）爬升

sentences.english: Harry climbed the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.

sentences.english: The words danced before her tired eyes.
sentences.chinese: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

sentences.english: The waltz is an easy dance to learn.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹这种舞很容易学。

detailed_translations.english: to move your body to the sound and rhythm of music
a special set of movements performed to a particular type of music

name: paint
trans: n. 油漆；颜料；（非正式）化妆；三秒区；（尤指模拟真画效果的）绘画功能；花马 v. 油漆；给（脸、皮肤）化妆；给……刷上（液体）；用绘图程序作画；（在雷达屏幕上）显示（飞机等）；描绘；画（图画）；描述 n. (Paint) （美）潘（人名）

sentences.english: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.chinese: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.english: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.english: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface
to make a picture, design etc using paint

name: slide
trans: v. 滑动；平稳地走；悄悄移动；逐渐恶化；贬值；衰落；不知不觉陷入；不加理睬 n. 滑动；下跌； 幻灯片；变糟；滑梯；滑垒；坡道滑；雪崩；载物玻璃片；（机器或乐器的）滑动装置；发夹；轻便鞋

sentences.english: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

name: wash
trans: v. 洗涤；洗澡；耐洗；洗刷；冲走；拍打；浸湿；（情绪）冲击；洗矿；粉刷；站得住脚；被冲蚀 n. 洗涤；（船或飞机驶过后留下的）波浪；波浪声；薄涂层；肥皂液；待洗的衣服；冲积物；泔水；（对双方无益的）形式；(the Wash) 沃什湾 n. (Wash) （美）瓦什（人名）

sentences.english: Those jeans need a good wash (= a thorough wash ).
sentences.chinese: 那条牛仔裤要好好洗一洗了。

sentences.english: I’ll just have a quick wash before we go out.
sentences.chinese: 我很快洗个澡，然后我们就出门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物
detailed_translations.english: an act of cleaning something using soap and water
to clean something using water and a type of soap

name: arms
trans: n. 臂（arm的复数）；[军] 武器；纹章 v. 武装；配备（arm的三单形式） n. (Arms)人名；(英)阿姆斯

name: comb
trans: n. 梳子；蜂巢；鸡冠 vt. 梳头发；梳毛 vi. （浪）涌起

sentences.english: Your hair needs a good comb.
sentences.chinese: 你的头发需要好好梳理一下。

sentences.english: Melanie ran upstairs to comb her hair.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮跑上楼去梳头发。

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal etc with a row of thin teeth on one side, used for making your hair tidy
to make hair look tidy using a comb

name: eight
trans: num. 八；八个；第八；八岁；八点 adj. 八的 n. 八人划船队

sentences.english: It’s only eight days till Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.english: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.english: My parents died when I was eight (= eight years old ).
sentences.chinese: 我8岁时父母就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 8

name: grocer
trans: n. 杂货店；食品商

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 厨师和杂货商为蛋价计较个没完。

sentences.english: He never overcharged when I went shopping in his grocer.
sentences.chinese: 我去他的杂货店买东西时他从不向我乱索价。

sentences.english: Just as our exchanges with the local grocer free us from backbreaking farm work, so do imports from around the world move us even more toward the very economic specialization that enriches us.
sentences.chinese: 就好像我们与当地的杂货店交易，我们就不用非常辛苦地从事农业劳动，来自全世界的进口品让我们更快地走向经济专业化，使我们富裕。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells food and other things used in the home

name: miller
trans: n. 磨坊主；碾磨工；蛾 n. (Miller)人名；(西、葡)米列尔；(英、德、法、爱沙、芬、罗、瑞典、波)米勒

name: trucker
trans: n. 卡车司机；从事货车运输业者

name: worker
trans: n. 工人；劳动者；职蚁 n. (Worker)人名；(英)沃克

sentences.english: the workers’ revolution
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级革命

detailed_translations.english: the members of the  working class
